programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Clip show. Joey bumbles down memory lane while being interviewed by a soap-opera magazine, while the gang takes on the full-time job of making sure he doesn't say anything stupid. Chandler: Matthew Perry. Phoebe: Lisa Kudrow.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Baby Shower
programme.desc: Monica incurs the wrath of Mrs. Green (Marlo Thomas) by forgetting to invite her to Rachel's baby shower, where the mom-to-be begins to see that she may not be ready for motherhood after all. Meanwhile, Ross and Chandler help Joey prep for an audition to host the world's worst game show. Katherine: Adria Tennor. Ray: Jonathan Nichols. Joey: Matt LeBlanc.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Cooking Class
programme.desc: Ross's date with a baby-furniture saleswoman (Rena Sofer) brings out the brat in Rachel; Joey and Monica sneak into a cooking class after a bad review sends the crestfallen chef on a mission to disprove her detractor; Phoebe teaches Chandler how to interview for a new job without annoying his future boss. Sarah: Molly Hagan. Eric: Tim Maculan. Mr. Tyler: Tucker Smallwood. Joey: Matt LeBlanc.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Rachel Is Late
programme.desc: A week past her due date, a grumpy Rachel's only hopes for inducing labor include spicy foods and something even spicier with Ross. Meanwhile, Monica and Phoebe try to make the baby wait interesting---and profitable; and Chandler catches heat for catching some sleep during Joey's big-screen debut. Estelle: June Gable. Dr. Long: Amanda Carlin. Ross: David Schwimmer.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Rachel Has a Baby
programme.desc: Part 1 of two. Rachel goes into labor, while in the waiting room, Chandler tests Monica's patience with his change of heart about starting a family and Phoebe flirts with a patient (Eddie McClintock). Doreen: Debi Mazar. Marc: Tim DeKay. Dr. Long: Amanda Carlin. Judy: Christina Pickles.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Rachel Has a Baby
programme.desc: Conclusion. The birth of Ross and Rachel's baby leads to a surprising turn of events for the proud parents. Cliff: Eddie McClintock. Dr. Long: Amanda Carlin. Janice: Maggie Wheeler.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where No One Proposes
programme.desc: At the hospital, Rachel thinks Joey proposed, Phoebe thinks Ross did and no one knows how to tell the other the truth. In the meantime, Monica and Chandler revisit the janitor's closet in an effort to conceive. Jack: Elliott Gould. Joey: Matt LeBlanc.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Emma's crying jag has Rachel nearly hysterical herself; Joey's effort to apologize for his semi-proposal proves all-too painful for Ross; and a sleep-deprived Chandler nods off in a staff meeting and wakes up with a nightmarish new job in Tulsa. Ms. McKenna: Janet Huber. Phoebe: Lisa Kudrow.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey sets Phoebe up with a stranger (Paul Rudd) to score a date with one of her friends; Rachel catches Ross visiting his pediatrician from childhood; and a job offer stands between Monica and Chandler's relocation to Tulsa. Sally: Elaine Hendrix. Dr. Gettleman: Gregory White. Mary Ellen: Dedee Pfeiffer.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Male Nanny
programme.desc: Phoebe's "big step forward" with Mike is tripped up by the return of the Scientist Guy (Hank Azaria); Emma's new nanny (Freddie Prinze Jr.) gets under Ross's skin; and Monica's cut-up of a co-worker has funnyman Chandler singing the blues. Mike: Paul Rudd. Prospective Nanny: Susan Slome. Phoebe: Lisa Kudrow. Joey: Matt LeBlanc.

programme.title: Mom
programme.sub-title: Night Swimmin' and an English Muffin
programme.desc: Bonnie discovers Adam is still close to his former wife (Wendie Malick), causing Christy to worry that the fallout might jeopardize Bonnie's sobriety.

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: Christy and Adam get into a car accident, and Bonnie's feelings are hurt when she discovers she is neither of their emergency contacts.

programme.sub-title: Black Mold and an Old Hot Dog
programme.desc: Christy helps Jill adjust to being a new foster mother. Meanwhile, Bonnie tries to convince tenants that she's an effective building manager.

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: A big secret about Bonnie's mother surfaces following her death.

programme.desc: Carl and Samuel hope for a little luck o' the Irish when it comes to picking up women at their St. Patrick's Day party, while Molly does a little Erin go bragging when she tells Mike about some of her holiday shenanigans.

programme.title: Mike & Molly
programme.desc: While Mike's giving out the ho-ho-hos as Santa, Molly's doling out their dough-dough-dough for holiday gifts, and he's getting a bit (hum)bugged about her spending. Later, their festive celebration at home is interrupted when they get corralled by Mike's mother and his boss into spending Christmas Eve at church with them.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Dave and Gemma host a memorable Thanksgiving in their new home when Dave's politically incorrect mother, Paula, visits from out of town and meets Calvin, Tina and the rest of the Butler family for the first time.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: When Malcolm is robbed and won't reveal the culprit, Calvin and Dave team up to crack the case of the missing sneakers. Also, Tina takes a unique approach to teaching Gemma self-defense.

programme.desc: Krabby Patties are banned from Bikini Bottom after SpongeBob's musical tribute annoys Miss Priss; SpongeBob's klutzy cousin Stanley visits and causes chaos.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: While working the graveyard shift, SpongeBob and Squidward fear a "hash-slinging slasher" is stalking them; Mr. Krabs wants to make a love connection with Mrs. Puff.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob cleans out the boating school lighthouse and finds a cute, but inconvenient, companion. No one in Bikini Bottom is safe from a case of contagious hiccups.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick encounter ghost pirates who are feuding with the Flying Dutchman.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob neglects to feed Gary because he's too wrapped up in completing a paddleball challenge. In fact, SpongeBob is so distracted that it takes him more than a week to notice a tired, hungry and sad Gary has run away to the city, where a grandmotherly woman (voice of Amy Poehler) offers the stray snail shelter, deviled eggs and fresh-baked cookies.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mr. Krabs wants Squidward to work harder, so he tells him about a crab that eats lazy employees. Later, SpongeBob longs to meet his newest hero, Kenny the Cat.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick make it their mission to reunite the recently fired robot band from Goofy Goober's; Patrick is sent to the pound for acting like a worm, but he won't be able to leave unless SpongeBob can train him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: A misunderstanding occurs, so SpongeBob and Patrick want to prove their life insurance protects them from any danger; SpongeBob blows a bubble boat for himself, and then nearly everyone in town wants one.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: A big goo bubble arises from the lagoon, and Plankton wants to use it for his own nefarious means.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves.

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge on the Run
programme.desc: When Gary turns up missing, SpongeBob believes that his pet has been stolen. With the help of his pal Patrick, SpongeBob ventures to the Lost City of Atlantic City to rescue his pet. Along the way, flashbacks reveal when the bond between SpongeBob and Gary first blossomed.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets
programme.desc: This delightful animated comedy follows two mismatched mutts who must find their way home after getting lost in NYC. During their journey, they encounter a bunny who plans to lead a group of abandoned pets on a mission of revenge against humanity.

programme.title: Sing 2
programme.desc: Buster and his new cast now have their sights set on debuting a new show at the Crystal Tower Theater in glamorous Redshore City. But with no connections, he and his singers must sneak into the Crystal Entertainment offices, run by the ruthless wolf mogul Jimmy Crystal, where the gang pitches the ridiculous idea of casting the lion rock legend Clay Calloway in their show. Buster must embark on a quest to find the now-isolated Clay and persuade him to return to the stage.

programme.desc: Squidwared and Bubble Bass need to have a ceasefire as they head to the Shell City together.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with Ross's Inappropriate Song
programme.desc: Phoebe makes a lasting---and loathsome---impression on Mike's folks; Rachel and Ross tickle Emma's funny bone with a raunchy rap song; and Chandler frets over the contents of a videotape he stole from Monica's ex's pad. Mike: Paul Rudd. Mr. Hanigan: Gregory Itzin. Mrs. Hanigan: Cristine Rose.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with Rachel's Other Sister
programme.desc: Rachel's brittle sis Amy (Christina Applegate) ignites a Thanksgiving-dinner war over which friend should be named Emma's guardian. Meanwhile, Monica's fit to be tied over her husband's plans to use their good china for dinner; and Phoebe shows Joey how to lie his way out of missing a "Days of Our Lives" parade appearance. Joey: Matt LeBlanc. Monica: Courteney Cox Arquette.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with Rachel's Phone Number
programme.desc: Joey fears that Monica has a new man after Chandler sneaks home to see his wife; Ross tries---and fails---to bond with Mike (Paul Rudd), while Rachel gives out her number a little too hastily during a night out with Phoebe. Kevin: Alan F. Smith. Bartender: Kevin Brief. Crazy Cat Lady: Irene White.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with Christmas in Tulsa
programme.desc: The idea of not spending the holidays with his new wife leads Chandler to make a not-so-very merry career choice. Ross: David Schwimmer. Phoebe: Lisa Kudrow. Chandler: Matthew Perry.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Rachel Goes Back to Work
programme.desc: Rachel shortens her maternity leave to keep a hotshot (Dermot Mulroney) from taking her job at Ralph Lauren; Joey gets Phoebe a gig as an extra on his soap, but she drives the director crazy. Actor: Paul Logan. Director: Evan Handler. Zelner: Steve Ireland. Female Extra: Heather Simms.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Gavin (Dermot Mulroney) gives Rachel a very interesting birthday gift; Ross begs Joey to stay away from Emma's hot new nanny (Melissa George); Mike meets---and then murders---Phoebe's unusual pet. Mike: Paul Rudd. Woman: Carly Thomas.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: A night at Mike's piano bar gives Monica a very showy moment in the spotlight; Ross tries to move on after spying Rachel and Gavin's kiss; Chandler employs his secret skill to repair Joey's botched eyebrow-waxing job. Mike: Paul Rudd. Gavin: Dermot Mulroney. Michelle: Jennifer Aspen. Molly: Melissa George.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Blind Dates
programme.desc: To get Ross and Rachel back together, Joey and Phoebe find them dire blind-date options, including a loser (Jon Lovitz) from Monica's past. Meanwhile, the Bings try to balance baby-making with baby-sitting and nearly get busted when Emma up and disappears. Waiter No. 1: Sam Pancake. Chandler: Matthew Perry. Joey: Matt LeBlanc.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey endures a draining audition at the hands of a pompous actor-director (Jeff Goldblum); Ross and Phoebe discover a secret link after being mugged together on the street; and Chandler's advertising internship gets off to an impressive---and depressing---start. Jordan: Teck Holmes. Lowell: Kyle Gass. Steve: Phill Lewis.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Boob Job
programme.desc: Mike (Paul Rudd) and Phoebe decide to live together, and she's thinking that it could be only the beginning. "Load up the Volvo," she says to Ross. "I want to be a soccer mom!" Meanwhile, Chandler and Monica are having money woes, so each goes to Joey to borrow money (without the other knowing, of course). And now that Emma's crawling, Rachel decides that it's time to baby-proof her apartment.

programme.sub-title: Tantric Sex and the Sprouted Flute
programme.desc: Christy annoys everyone when she adopts her new boyfriend's healthy lifestyle. Meanwhile, Bonnie and Adam decide to move to the next level in their relationship.

programme.title: Mom
programme.sub-title: A Cricket and a Hedge Made of Gold
programme.desc: Marjorie takes a break from the group, so Bonnie becomes the go-to person for everyone's problems. Also, Christy faces a painful memory from her past.

programme.title: Mom
programme.sub-title: A Few Thongs and a Hawaiian Funeral
programme.desc: Christy and Jill take Emily to see her biological mother in rehab, and make a surprising discovery. Meanwhile, Bonnie watches Adam's dog while he is out of town.

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: Season 4 ends with Bonnie getting into trouble with the IRS. Christy tries to help her but soon realizes she is in over her head, so she suggests Bonnie seek help from her newfound brother, Ray.

Later, each crew receives new orders for a new mission – to take over the station at all costs. The crews then find themselves in old but familiar sides of conflict once again – but are unsure if they should act on their orders.

As the three brave dangerous Indian territory, they discover their prey has fallen in with a more-experienced criminal.

programme.title: Your Honor
programme.desc: Picking up in the aftermath of a terrible accident, a grieving Michael Desiato is beyond hope. After fleeing the scene, Eugene is aided by unlikely benefactors, including new Mayor Charlie Figaro, Big Mo and the police. Jimmy Baxter looks to expand his criminal empire, while Gina Baxter channels her anger over her dead son. The arrival in town of Assistant U.S. Attorney Olivia Delmont will upend Michael's life in ways he can't begin to imagine.

programme.title: Your Honor
programme.desc: Michael Desiato discovers a jaw-dropping secret. Olivia Delmont seizes an opportunity to push Michael to make a dangerous decision. Meanwhile, a desperate business deal hatched by Little Mo and the Desire Crew threatens Eugene and his low-key life on the run. Elizabeth shelters Michael while Big Mo's big plans place her directly in the crosshairs of Gina.

programme.title: Your Honor

programme.title: Your Honor
programme.desc: Michael attends Jimmy's birthday party where a legendary figure returns.

programme.title: Your Honor

programme.title: Your Honor
programme.desc: Michael and Elizabeth pursue a lead in Robin's murder case.

This riveting crime thriller follows financially strapped brothers (Philip Seymour Hoffman, Ethan Hawke) whose foolproof jewelry-store heist goes awry in tragic ways that leave two people dead. Albert Finney is superb as the siblings' father, and owner of the targeted shop. The film's title comes from an Irish toast: "May you be in heaven half an hour before the devil knows you're dead."

programme.desc: FBI agent John Travolta faces off against terrorist Nicolas Cage in this suspenseful drama, in which the two principals trade identities after their faces are swapped surgically. programme.desc: A sharpshooting FBI agent goes undercover as a surfer to stop a crime wave. The criminals wear rubber masks of former U.S. presidents when robbing banks.

programme.desc: Six Oscars, including Best Picture and Actor (Tom Hanks), went to this extraordinary tale of a simple man who unwittingly becomes involved in some of the key moments of the 20th century. programme.desc: Joey's soap-star-studded party helps Rachel forget about getting romantic with her roomie, who catches the eye---and maybe more---of Ross's newest love interest (Aisha Tyler). Meanwhile, Chandler endures the attacks of a man-hater (Alex Borstein) during a wild one-woman show. Daytime actors Matthew Ashford and Kyle Lowder appear in cameos. Dirk: Ethan Erickson.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Fertility Test
programme.desc: Rachel runs into a familiar face during her free massage from one of Phoebe's corporate-chain foes, while the Bings try to run away from a frightening face at their doctor's office. Meanwhile, Ross tutors Joey on the ways to win over a brainiac like Charlie (Aisha Tyler), who may have her mind set on another man. Janice: Maggie Wheeler. Nurse: Myra Turley.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler eyes up---and picks out---a coworker (John Stamos) who could be the prime sperm donor for him and Monica; Phoebe runs into an ex (Hank Azaria) en route to a party where she plans to spite Mike; Rachel buddies up to Charlie after opening her big mouth about Joey; and Ross secures a speaking gig in the tropics.

programme.title: Avengers: Infinity War
programme.desc: The Avengers and all of their partners unite to assemble their power in order to fight the necessary battle against their biggest collective enemy, Thanos, before he can wreak his havoc across the entire world.

programme.title: Avengers: Endgame
programme.desc: After the events of Infinity War leaves half of the universe in ruins, the remaining Avengers must work together to recruit old and new allies and muster all of their remaining strength and resources to defeat the mad titan Thanos and bring their friends back from the brink of oblivion.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is caught between a rock and a hard place when he's responsible for distributing extra grant money. Also, Bernadette turns the backyard playhouse into a hideaway from her husband and kids.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon tries to bond with Amy's father, but when Howard lures Mr. Fowler away with magic tricks, Sheldon has no choice but to bond with Mrs. Fowler. Raj and Anu try to get physical for the first time.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy are devastated after learning from a Russian paper that Super Asymmetry has already been discovered and disproven. Also, ultra-competitive Bernadette asks Stuart's girlfriend, Denise, to teach her how to beat Howard in a popular videogame.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy are still down about their theory being disproven, but a VHS tape from Sheldon's past inspires him not to give up. Also, Bernadette turns into a pageant mom when she tries to help Wolowitz ace his Magic Castle audition.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny and Leonard organize a paintball game that results in mayhem when Sheldon is jealous of Amy. Also, Koothrappali catches Anu with her ex-boyfriend, and Stuart doesn't want to move in with Denise.

programme.title: Sylvia Scarlett
programme.desc: A young woman steals some expensive lace and hopes to smuggle it from France to England with her father. To elude police, she cuts her hair short and disguises herself as a man.

programme.title: Gay USA
programme.desc: Shot on one day by 25 different cameramen across the USA under the co-ordination of Arthur J. Bressan Jr. this film documents Gay Pride parades across the United States in the late 70s.

programme.title: Torch Song Trilogy
programme.desc: A gay man struggles to find love and respect in New York City. His attempt to start a family hits a tragic bump and his disapproving mother only exacerbates things. Adaptation of the play by Harvey Fierstein.

programme.title: The Queen
programme.desc: A peek behind the scenes of a nationwide drag queen competition held in New York City, showcasing the rehearsals, discussions and rivalries that endure long after the winner is crowned.

programme.title: The Bitter Tears of Petra von Kant
programme.desc: Rainer Werner Fassbinder's story of a love triangle involving a lesbian fashion designer (Margit Carstensen). Hanna Schygulla. Marlene: Irm Hermann. Sidoni: Katrin Schaake. Gabriele: Eva Matts. Valerie: Gisela Fackelday.

programme.title: The Blue Angel
programme.desc: Marlene Dietrich plays a tawdry cabaret singer (introducing the song "Falling in Love Again") who becomes the object of obsession for a highly moral, elderly professor.

programme.title: Queen Christina
programme.desc: Mixture of history and fiction stars Greta Garbo as the 17th-century Swedish monarch who was raised as a boy to succeed to the throne, but finds love with a dashing Spanish emissary.

programme.title: Artistic Temper
programme.desc: Ruth Etting stars as a housewife who longs to be a singer, but runs into interference from her snooty doctor-husband (Wilfred Lytell), who considers show people to be beneath them. Etting sings "That's What Heaven Means to Me," "Lovable" and "Trying to Live Without You." Directed by Roy Mack.

programme.title: The Falcon in Hollywood
programme.desc: The Falcon (Tom Conway) probes murder at a film studio. Peggy: Barbara Hale. Billie: Veda Ann Borg. Dwyer: John Abbott. Louie: Sheldon Leonard. Roxana: Jean Brooks. Hoffman: Konstantin Shayne. Lili: Rita Corday. McBride: Emory Parnell. Standard. Directed by Gordon Douglas.

programme.title: King for a Day
programme.desc: Musical short starring legendary tap dancer Bill Robinson as a hoofer who plays craps with a vaudeville producer to win a part in his latest song-and-dance extravaganza. Ernest Whitman. Featuring performances by singers Hattie Noel and Muriel Rahn. Directed by Roy Mack.

programme.title: A Chorus Line
programme.desc: Richard Attenborough's adaptation of Michael Bennett's smash musical about the dreams of dancers at an audition. Michael Douglas, Alyson Reed, Terrence Mann. Paul: Cameron English. Val: Audrey Landers. Sheila: Vicki Frederick. Mike: Charles McGowan. Morales: Yamil Borges. Richie: Gregg Burge. Songs by Marvin Hamlisch.

programme.title: The Song of Fame
programme.desc: A musical short featuring Ruth Etting singing "Shine On, Harvest Moon." Also: a performance by the Canova Family.

programme.title: Kramer vs. Kramer
programme.desc: In this Best Picture winner, a woman who walked out on her husband and child returns to reclaim her son in a custody battle.

programme.title: Out of Africa
programme.desc: Danish author Isak Dinesen's memoirs recall her years running a coffee plantation in Kenya, her philandering husband, and her romance with an adventurer.

programme.title: The Go Between
programme.desc: A tale of torrid and forbidden love between a couple in the English countryside.

programme.title: Sunday Bloody Sunday
programme.desc: A woman has a sexual relationship with a young bisexual sculptor who also carries on an intimate relationship with a doctor who is an acquaintance of the woman. The simmering tensions between the three bubble over when the woman and the artist agree to babysit for a couple that also knows all three of the people in this romantic triangle.

programme.title: The Locket
programme.desc: Complex psychological melodrama about a schizophrenic and the man she ruins.

programme.title: The Two Mrs. Carrolls
programme.desc: A homicidal artist does away with a wife by lacing her milk with poison, and after remarrying and eventually falling out of love with his new spouse, tries the same manner of murder, but she begins to suspect he's up to something nefarious.

programme.title: Conflict
programme.desc: This psychological thriller stars Humphrey Bogart as a clever husband who hatches a plan to murder his wife so he can marry her sister.

programme.title: Sinbad the Sailor
programme.desc: The adventuresome Arabian Nights hero sets out to find a treasure hidden by Alexander the Great, but first must find a map to the island where it is buried.

programme.title: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
programme.desc: A kind-hearted and selfless doctor creates a serum that transforms him into a lecherous jerk. The good man attempts to win the heart of a virtuous woman, while his amoral alter-ego pursues a good-time girl.

programme.title: The Locket
programme.desc: Complex psychological melodrama about a schizophrenic and the man she ruins.

programme.title: Kind Lady
programme.desc: An elderly art-and-antique collector is targeted by a nefarious young painter, who covets all of her priceless belongings.

programme.title: The Cobweb
programme.desc: A study of the neuroses of patients and staff at a posh psychiatric clinic, where the selection of new drapes for the hospital library sparks a war among a doctor's wife and a number of the institution's personnel.

programme.title: Butterfield 8
programme.desc: John O'Hara's story about the affairs of an amoral beauty won an Oscar for Elizabeth Taylor.

programme.title: Sense and Sensibility
programme.desc: Oscar-nominated adaptation of Jane Austen's novel about the still-single Dashwood sisters and how they cope with men, marriage and money after their father dies. The screenplay (written by star Emma Thompson) was the sole Oscar winner out of seven nominations.

programme.title: Top Chef VIP
programme.desc: Para conseguir la inmunidad los concursantes deben usar su intuición para replicar un plato que no podrán ver. Rosie se bloquea y se cuestiona su participación en la competencia.

programme.title: El Señor de los Cielos
programme.desc: Milton Jiménez le comparte a Belén un video con el que le garantiza, destruirá a su contrincante y aunque él le exige que no lo muestre, ella lo hace durante el debate en cadena nacional.

programme.title: Caso cerrado
programme.desc: Carmen recupera a su hija, pero Lucía y Alejandro insisten en que la niña estaba mejor bajo sus cuidados. No quiere que su anciana madre practique la kunyaza, una técnica de placer sexual.

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Tras recuperar su memoria, Jason Bourne vuelve a la acción con sus arriesgadas misiones secretas. Sin embargo, el más letal de los agentes de los cuerpos de élite de la CIA ahora se hace preguntas que no tienen repuestas. Todavía está desorientado por el mundo actual, convulsionado, inmerso en una crisis económica sin precedentes, colapsado financieramente, desgarrado por guerras cibernéticas y con diferentes organizaciones mafiosas que luchan por el poder.

programme.title: Caso Cerrado

Ante el asombro de la jueza, el muchacho relata los hechos y brinda una detallada explicación del por qué de ese mote hacia su progenitor. Con el correr de su declaración, parece convencer a la doctora y a todos los presentes.

Val Kilmer, Paula Patton, Jim Caviezel, Adam Goldberg.

Ido intentará proteger a Alita de su misterioso pasado, mientras que su nuevo amigo Hugo le ayudará a despertar sus recuerdos. En ese momento, Alita descubre que posee habilidades de combate extraordinarias, que podría usar para salvar a su nueva familia y amigos.

Along with a helicopter pilot and his daughter, they race to rescue the sole inhabitant as a massive tidal wave threatens to destroy the island.

programme.title: Deliver Us From Evil
programme.desc: An NYPD cop teams up with an unorthodox priest to investigate a rash of demonic possessions in this shocking supernatural thriller. Inspired by real events.

programme.title: Sound of Violence
programme.desc: As a child, the brutal murder of her family made Alexis regain her hearing along with synesthetic abilities. Now as an adult, she finds solace in the sounds of bodily harm. But when she's told she might lose her hearing again, she escalates her gruesome sound experiments in a quest to compose her masterpiece.

programme.title: 13 Hours: The Secret Soldiers of Benghazi
programme.desc: A security team of six ex-military private contractors defend a covert CIA annex in Benghazi, Libya, from a coordinated attack by Islamic militants on Sept. 11, 2012.

programme.title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
programme.desc: In this outrageous comedy-drama, TV reporter Kim Baker decides to serve as a foreign correspondent in Afghanistan, where she is embedded with a Marine unit. During her time abroad, she is forced to contend with a fiery U.S. general, and befriends a fellow reporter and a British photographer.

programme.title: The Evening Star
programme.desc: In this sequel to the award-winning classic 'Terms of Endearment,' Aurora Greenaway tries to pick up the pieces after her daughter's death and find renewed strength and love while struggling to raise her rebellious grandchildren. Shirley MacLaine, Bill Paxton, Juliette Lewis, Miranda Richardson, Ben Johnson, Scott Wolf, George Newbern, Marion Ross, Mackenzie Astin, Donald Moffat, China Kantner.

programme.title: Big Night
programme.desc: In a last-ditch effort to save their foundering Italian restaurant, two immigrant brothers put up every penny they have to stage a publicity event, eventually turning to a business competitor with showbiz connections. Stanley Tucci, Tony Shalhoub, Minnie Driver, Isabella Rossellini, Ian Holm, Marc Anthony, Allison Janney.

programme.title: Warrior Strong
programme.desc: To save the career he endangered with his hotheaded attitude, professional basketball player Bilal Irving takes on a new job - coaching the failing basketball team in his hometown of Dumont, Ontario. He's got just one obstacle: his former coach, whose ideas about coaching vastly differ from that of Bilal's. The two will have to put aside their differences and their attitudes if this small-town team is to have any chance at winning.

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: In this nail-biting chiller, Simon and Robyn, a young married couple, find their lives thrown into a tailspin after Simon has a chance encounter with a former acquaintance, the off-kilter Gordo. Gordo then starts giving the couple unwanted and increasingly menacing gifts.

programme.title: The Transporter Refueled
programme.desc: A suave courier-for-hire gets involved in a bank heist perpetrated by two mysterious blondes, which in turn earns him the enmity of a fearsome adversary in this reboot of the high-octane action franchise.

programme.title: Devotion
programme.desc: American Navy fighter pilots Lieutenant Tom Hudner and Ensign Jesse Brown worked together during the Korean War to protect their country. Brown, who became the first African American carrier pilot in the Navy, built a bond with his wingman Hudner. The heroic sacrifices of the two elite pilots make history. Based on a true story.

programme.title: Cloud Atlas
programme.desc: This wildly ambitious and deeply moving epic comprises six tales from various historical eras. An 18th-century notary goes on a sea voyage; a musician becomes an apprentice to a famous composer in 1930s Belgium; a journalist uncovers corruption at a nuclear power plant in '70s California; a contemporary publisher seeks refuge from gangsters at a nursing home; a clone escapes her job at a fast-food establishment in futuristic Korea; a tribesman struggles to survive in a postapocalyptic wasteland.

programme.title: Vacancy
programme.desc: When their car breaks down, a troubled couple get stranded at a rundown motel and discover they are being set up to be the next victims in a series of snuff films. Luke Wilson and Kate Beckinsale star in this scary and stylish suspense thriller. Directed by Nimrod Antal.

programme.title: Pixie
programme.desc: Pixie wants to avenge her mother's death by masterminding a heist, but her plans go awry and she finds herself on the run with two young men who are way out of their depth being chased across the Wild Irish countryside by deadly gangster priests. She has to pit her wits against everyone, taking on the patriarchy to claim the right to shape her own life.

programme.title: Narc
programme.desc: Two disturbed detectives join forces to investigate an undercover cop's murder. As they develop mutual respect for one another, unethical conduct reveals dark truths that could split them apart. Writer-director Joe Carnahan shot the film in 27 days, and spent the last 10 working on the climactic finale set in an actual chop shop.

programme.title: The Wrath of Becky
programme.desc: After flipping through foster homes with her dog Diego for a couple of years, Becky sets out on her own. She ends up with Elena and gets a job at a diner. But a group of insurrectionists comes to town and harasses her, eventually kidnapping her dog. Becky snaps again and takes revenge like only she can.

programme.title: X
programme.desc: In the 1970s, an adult film crew goes to a remote Texas farm to shoot a film. The elderly couple they are renting from is unaware of what the crew intends for their property. But they do take an unusual interest in the young team. When the couple discovers the real intention of the youngsters, a night of profit-making passion turns to terror as they fight for their lives against their enraged hosts.

programme.title: Still Smokin'
programme.desc: Renowned stoners Cheech and Chong return, this time heading to Amsterdam to attend a celebrity party.

programme.title: The Truman Show
programme.desc: Jim Carrey's strong performance drives this inspired satire of the media. He plays the unwitting star of a reality-TV show chronicling his life; Linney costars as his wife; and Ed Harris netted a Best Supporting Actor nomination as the show's director. Peter Weir directed and received an Oscar nomination of his own. Noah Emmerich, Natascha McElhone, Holland Taylor.

programme.title: Marcel: The Shell with Shoes On
programme.desc: The animated film follows the life of a young mollusk named Marcel as he discovers the world anew. When a documentary filmmaker shares an online snippet of Marcel, the shy shell goes viral. Soon, Marcel goes on a life-changing adventure to find his lost family.

programme.title: Romy and Michele's High School Reunion
programme.desc: A likable cast and a fun premise make this a must-see movie. Mira Sorvino and Lisa Kudrow star as ditsy blondes en route to their class reunion. They're determined to impress their classmates and scramble to play the part of sophisticated businesswomen. But one classmate knows the truth and threatens to expose the two for who they really are. Janeane Garofalo, Alan Cumming.

programme.title: The Fighting Temptations
programme.desc: Beyonce Knowles and Cuba Gooding Jr. star in this lively musical comedy about an ad executive who must lead a Georgia choir to victory in a gospel competition if he is to collect his inheritance. Along the way, he finds himself getting in tune romantically with one of the singers.

programme.title: Past Lives
programme.desc: Growing up in a small South Korean town, Hae Sung and Nora shared a deep, inextricable bond that was suddenly torn asunder by Nora's family's emigration to the United States. Twenty years later, the childhood sweethearts inexplicably cross paths and share one emotionally-charged week that forces them to confront long-dormant feelings and their hopes for the future.

programme.title: Set Up
programme.desc: Double crossing and a diamond heist come together when a group of criminal friends is betrayed by one of their own. Enlisting the help of an infamous mob boss, one of the friends seeks his revenge.

programme.title: Varsity Blues
programme.desc: In this rousing coming-of-age tale, a second-string high-school quarterback (James Van Der Beek) replaces the injured starter. At first, the quarterback revels in his new role, but then, his relaxed attitude causes problems with his gung-ho coach (Jon Voight). Paul Walker, Rob Lester, Scott Caan, Richard Lineback, Ali Larter, Tiffany C. Love.

programme.title: At Any Price
programme.desc: In this emotionally charged family drama, the son of a powerful farming magnate endeavors to become a professional race-car driver as the family business starts to buckle under the weight of an intense investigation.

programme.desc: In this achingly beautiful drama, a female department-store employee in 1950s New York falls for a woman stuck in a loveless marriage. Unfortunately, the latter's husband threatens to take their child if the relationship between the two women continues.
